def_cn: (任务、工作)招致不满的，引起反感的
def_en: If you describe a task or job as invidious, you mean that it is unpleasant because it is likely to make you unpopular.

def_cn: (比较、选择)不公平的，难以决定的
def_en: An invidious comparison or choice between two things is an unfair one because the two things are very different or are equally good or bad.
